for max in $(seq 100 100 1000); do
    echo -n "max=$max  "
    prism model.prism m.props -sim -simsamples 100 -const maxPop=$max | \
      grep "Result"
done

R{"goat_population"}=? [ C<=100 ]
R{"tiger_population"}=? [ C<=100 ]

max=100  Result: 3353.483153596298 (+/- 41.47415914948375 with probability 0.99; rel err 0.012367486953082372)
